channel.title: Removal of the Bonus Guide
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Removal of the Bonus Guide"

item.title: Re: Removal of the Bonus Guide
item.content:encoded: Truthfully, so did I. However, those ad heavy pages support Billy, so I'm not willing to complain too much.

item.title: Re: Removal of the Bonus Guide
item.content:encoded: Unfortunate. I really preferred it to navigating through ad-heavy poorly designed pages.

item.title: Removal of the Bonus Guide
item.content:encoded:
The bonus guide has blanked out for the moment, locked, and removed from the guide menu. While the guide was super convenient, it was kind of an exploit. The second stamina bonus is there to help draw attention to AnimeCubed.com, and if you can just bypass all the clicking it's kind of defeating the point.

I may re-add it without the links being active, depending on some conversations that I have.
